name: Sunny Flowers
description:
These happy little sunflowers cannot handle the fact that their buds are taking more sun! They want to have more area to sun bathe in.

Only played with 2 players.
Player 1 uses WASD to move, and Space to shoot sun.
Player 2 uses the Arrow Keys to move, and M to shoot sun.

Shoot sun at the opposing player to gain more territory. Once they are knocked off the map, you win.

Week 11 game for my Rapid Prototyping class, made alongside Kenny Hale.
Theme: Collecting
Constraints: Local multiplayer, has to have a sunflower.
